short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WeAreDevs++ is a browser extension that drmatically changes the design of WeAreDevs and adds new features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
0.3.1 out now!
CHANGELOG:
Removed Christmas Theme
Added support for DMs
Added support for Moderator panel.



WeAreDevs++ gives users a large variety of features, customization options and design changes.

Ever want a modern, oled friendly design for WeAreDevs? This extension has it!
Ever want to make custom themes for the website? Yep, it can do that too!

Try out this extension to improve your WRD experience by 10 times! (No, seriously. I'm not joking!)
